member.name: IDXGIFactory5.CheckFeatureSupport
member.summary: Used to check for hardware feature support.
member.param: Specifies one member of to query support for.
Specifies a pointer to a buffer that will be filled with data that describes the feature support.
The size, in bytes, of pFeatureSupportData.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDXGIFactory5
member.summary: This interface enables a single method to support variable refresh rate displays.
